name: CentroSync
tag_list: web-design, it-consulting, risk-management, risk-analysis, graphic-design, computer-repair, ntework-management, database-design, software-engineering
overview:
CentroSync, LLC is an IT & Risk Consulting Company that specializes in delivering affordable high-end low cost Information Technology consultancy and client tailored solutions.

Our web development department is equipped with a team with more than ten years of experience in web development and programming. With expertise in web languages such as PHP, ASP.NET, VB.NET, MYSQL, we are also heavily involved in CMS projects where open source technologies such as WordPress, Drupal, Joomla, Mod-X and a few others are used. Other popular development circles we are focused include e-commerce and mobile development. We pry on quality production with optimum turn-around time. In addition, we are Goal oriented and professional, yet fun and easy to work with.

With CentroSync, every customer is UNIQUE. That is why we have developed programs and packages that are centered on individual clients and their needs. Your happiness, is our goal, but high productivity and high quality products is our mark.
